titleStmt.title: An exact legendary compendiously containing the whole life of Alderman Abel, the maine proiecter and patentee for the raising of wines. His apprentiship with a vintener, betrothing to his wife, the manner of his rising reigning, and after delinquencie, whereby he stands liable to a severe censure and penalty in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: A. H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Signed at end: A. H. [i.e. William Abele].
